title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 451.3 - Duty, accountability and transparency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 451.3 - Duty, accountability and transparency

State Regulations

Pursuant to the authority granted to the superintendent by Public Health Law section 280-a(2)(g) to limit the duties, obligations, requirements and other provisions relating to pharmacy benefit managers under Public Health Law section 280-a(2), the duties, obligations and requirements contained in Public Health Law section 280-a(2)(b), (c), (d), (e), and (f) shall not apply to pharmacy benefit managers until January 1, 2023. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
